system.note:
Can fire on high-power mode: +1 Damage, consumes two ammo per shot and Gains Unreliable Quality
Can fire on Overload mode: +2 Damage, +2 PEN, consumes four ammo per shot and,  Gains Overheats and Unreliable Qualities
